id.dldescription: Unique Id of the animal event

herdEvent.dldescription: If this event was one of a group recorded simultaneously, the heardEvent relates the individual events

eventDate.dldescription: ISO8601 date format 2018-07-19T23:00:08+00:00. The date that the event occured

notes.dldescription: Any notes relating to the event

eventType.dldescription: Type of this observation from the unique list of event types at https://www.datalinker.org/context/EventTypeCatalog

content.dldescription: The class specified by event type. For specific event types refer to https://www.datalinker.org/context/EventTypeCatalog

dateModified.dldescription: ISO8601 date format 2018-07-19T23:00:08+00:00. When details were last modified

reference.dldescription: Unique reference for this observation within the source system.  May be an internal code

meta.dldescription: Any metadata for the event.  Most likely to use 'modified'
